Create ADAE Summary Table

Source: R/adae_utils.R
build_adae_summary.Rd

Create ADAE Summary Table

Usage

build_adae_summary(adae, filter_cond = NULL, event_vars, trt_var)

Arguments

adae

(data.frame)
ADAE dataset.

filter_cond

(character)
Filtering condition required for adae.

event_vars

(vector of character)
Variables added to source ADAE by add_adae_flags().

trt_var

(character)
Arm variable used to split table into columns.

Value

List containing layout object of ADAE Summary Table and filtered ADAE data

See also

Other adae_utils: add_adae_flags(), build_adae_by_sev_tox()

Examples


library(rtables)
#> Loading required package: formatters
#> Loading required package: magrittr
#> Warning: package 'magrittr' was built under R version 4.1.3
adsl <- random.cdisc.data::cadsl
adae <- random.cdisc.data::cadae
adae_ <- add_adae_flags(adae)
lyt <- build_adae_summary(
  adae = adae_,
  filter_cond = NULL,
  event_vars = setdiff(names(adae_), names(adae)),
  trt_var = "ARM"
)
build_table(lyt = lyt$lyt, df = lyt$df_out, alt_counts_df = adsl)
#>                                                             A: Drug X    B: Placebo    C: Combination   All Patients
#> Adverse Events                                               (N=134)       (N=134)        (N=132)         (N=400)   
#> --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
